entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
